verses.name: 1 Kings 8:9
verses.text: There was nothing in the ark save the two tables of stone, which Moses put there at Horeb, when the Lord made a covenant with the children of Israel, when they came out of the land of Egypt.

verses.name: 1 Kings 8:10
verses.text: And it came to pass, when the priests were come out of the holy place, that the cloud filled the house of the Lord,

verses.name: 1 Kings 8:11
verses.text: So that the priests could not stand to minister because of the cloud: for the glory of the Lord had filled the house of the Lord.
